text: Grimsby (released as The Brothers Grimsby in North America) is a 2016 British American spy action comedy movie directed by Louis Leterrier and starring Sacha Baron Cohen, Mark Strong, Isla Fisher, Rebel Wilson, Pen√©lope Cruz, Gabourey Sidibe, Annabelle Wallis, Ian McShane. It was distributed by Sony Pictures Releasing and was a box office failure. == Other websites == * * * Category:2016 action movies Category:2016 comedy movies Category:2010s action comedy movies Category:2010s spy movies Category:British action movies Category:British comedy movies Category:British spy movies Category:American action comedy movies Category:American spy movies Category:Movies about brothers Category:Movies set in Chile Category:Movies set in Indonesia Category:Movies set in England Category:Movies set in South Africa Category:Movies directed by Louis Leterrier
